title: 41 writers return Indian award, cite climate of intolerance
text:
> General 41 writers return Indian award, cite climate of intolerance Books by Indian writer Nayantara Sahgal are arranged for illustration purpose at a bookstore in New Delhi, India, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. Dozens of writers, including Sahgal, have returned India's highest literary honor to protest what they call a growing climate of intolerance in the country since Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government took office.
